author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Trump Task Force Spends Nearly 20 Minutes Answering Jim Acosta During White House Briefing
description: Trump was non-combative with Acosta, referring to him as "Jim" throughout the briefing and did not berate him or any other reporter as "fake news" for their questions.
content:
President Donald Trump and the White House coronavirus task force spent nearly 20 minutes answer questions from CNN’s Jim Acosta on Tuesday.
Acosta brought up about 15 different questions and interjections as the task force offered him detailed information a… [+3838 chars]
